metadata.title: CVE-2024-6126 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the cockpit package. This flaw allows an authenticateduser to kill any process when enabling the pam_env's user_readenv option,which leads to a denial of service (DoS) attack.

criterions.comment: cockpit package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
